sections.heading: TESTATE SUCCESSIONArt. 3371. After homologation of final tableau of distributionA
sections.text: At any time after the homologation of the final tableau of distribution, a legatee or an heir may file a petition to be sent into possession, alleging the facts showing that he is a legatee or an heir. Upon the filing
